01869     /*!\fn int send_php( SOCKET s, int _code , char *buf, int n )
01870      *
01871      *\brief send data onto the socket
01872      *
01873      *\param s connected socket
01874      *\param buf pointer to buffer
01875      *\param n number of characters we want to send
01876      *\param _code Code for php decoding rule
01877      *
01878      *\return -1 on error, n on success
01879      */
01880 
01881     int send_php( SOCKET s, int _code , char *buf, int n )
01882     {
01883         int bcount = 0 ;   /* counts bytes read */
01884         int br = 0 ;       /* bytes read this pass */
01885         char *ptr = NULL ; /* temp char ptr ;-) */
01886         char tmpstr[ HEAD_SIZE +1 ] = "";
01887         char head[ HEAD_SIZE +1 ] = "" ;
01888         char code[ HEAD_CODE +1 ] = "" ;
01889 
01890         snprintf( tmpstr , HEAD_SIZE + 1 , "%%0%dd" , HEAD_SIZE );
01891         snprintf( head , HEAD_SIZE + 1 , tmpstr , n );
01892         snprintf( tmpstr , HEAD_SIZE + 1 , "%%0%dd" , HEAD_CODE );
01893         snprintf( code , HEAD_CODE + 1 , tmpstr , _code );
01894 
01895         /* sending head */
01896         bcount = br = 0 ;
01897         ptr = head ;
01898         while ( bcount < HEAD_SIZE )                 /* loop until full buffer */
01899         {
01900             if ( ( br = send( s, head , HEAD_SIZE - bcount, NETFLAGS ) ) > 0 )
01901             {
01902                 bcount += br;                /* increment byte counter */
01903                 ptr += br;                   /* move buffer ptr for next read */
01904             }
01905             else
01906             {                            /* signal an error to the caller */
01907                 n_log( LOG_ERR ,  "Socket %d sending Error %d when sending head size" , s , br );
01908                 return FALSE;
01909             }
01910         }
01911 
01912         /* sending code */
01913         bcount = br = 0 ;
01914         ptr = code ;
01915         while ( bcount < HEAD_CODE )                 /* loop until full buffer */
01916         {
01917             if ( ( br = send( s, code , HEAD_CODE - bcount, NETFLAGS ) ) > 0 )
01918             {
01919                 bcount += br;                /* increment byte counter */
01920                 ptr += br;                   /* move buffer ptr for next read */
01921             }
01922             else
01923             {
01924                 n_log( LOG_ERR ,  "Socket %d sending Error %d when sending head code" , s , br );
01925                 return FALSE;
01926             }
01927         }
01928 
01929         /* sending buf */ 
01930         bcount = 0;
01931         br = 0;
01932         while ( bcount < n )                 /* loop until full buffer */
01933         {
01934             if ( ( br = send( s, buf, n - bcount, NETFLAGS ) ) > 0 )
01935             {
01936                 bcount += br;                /* increment byte counter */
01937                 buf += br;                   /* move buffer ptr for next read */
01938             }
01939             else
01940             {                            /* signal an error to the caller */
01941                 n_log( LOG_ERR , "Socket %d sending Error %d when sending message of size %d" , s , br , n );
01942                 return FALSE;
01943             }
01944         }
01945 
01946         return bcount;
01947 
01948     } /*send_php(...)*/

01951 
01952     /*!\fn int recv_php( SOCKET s, int *_code , char **buf )
01953      *
01954      *\brief recv data from the socket
01955      *
01956      *\param s connected socket
01957                  *\param _code pointer to store the code
01958      *\param buf pointer to buffer
01959      *
01960      *\return -1 on error, size on success
01961      */
01962     int recv_php( SOCKET s, int *_code , char **buf )
01963     {
01964         int bcount = 0 ; /* counts bytes read */
01965         int br = 0 ;     /* bytes read this pass */
01966         long int tmpnb = 0 , size = 0 ;   /* size of message to receive */
01967         char *ptr = NULL ;
01968 
01969         char head[ HEAD_SIZE + 1 ] = "" ;
01970         char code[ HEAD_CODE + 1]  = "" ;
01971 
01972         /* Receiving total message size */
01973         bcount = br = 0 ;
01974         ptr = head;
01975         while ( bcount < HEAD_SIZE )
01976         {                                        /* loop until full buffer */
01977             if ( ( br = recv( s, ptr , HEAD_SIZE - bcount, NETFLAGS ) ) > 0 )
01978             {
01979                 bcount += br;                    /* increment byte counter */
01980                 ptr += br;                       /* move buffer ptr for next read */
01981             }
01982             else
01983             {
01984                 if( br == 0 && bcount == ( HEAD_SIZE - bcount ) )
01985                     break ;
01986                 /* signal an error to the caller */
01987                 n_log( LOG_ERR , "Socket %d receive %d Error %s" , s  , br , strerror( errno ) );
01988                 return FALSE;
01989             }
01990         }
01991 
01992         tmpnb = strtol( head , NULL , 10 );
01993         if( tmpnb == LONG_MIN || tmpnb == LONG_MAX )
01994         {
01995             n_log( LOG_ERR , "Size received ( %ld ) can not be determined on socket %d" , tmpnb , s );
01996             return FALSE ;
01997         }
01998 
01999         size = tmpnb ;
02000 
02001         /* receiving request code */
02002         bcount = br = 0 ;
02003         ptr = code;
02004         while ( bcount < HEAD_CODE )
02005         {                                        /* loop until full buffer */
02006             if ( ( br = recv( s, ptr , HEAD_CODE - bcount, NETFLAGS ) ) > 0 )
02007             {
02008                 bcount += br;                    /* increment byte counter */
02009                 ptr += br;                       /* move buffer ptr for next read */
02010             }
02011             else
02012             {  
02013                 if( br == 0 && bcount == ( HEAD_CODE - bcount ) )
02014                     break ;
02015                 /* signal an error to the caller */
02016                 n_log( LOG_ERR , "Socket %d receive %d Error" , s  , br );
02017                 return FALSE;
02018             }
02019         }
02020 
02021         tmpnb = strtol( code , NULL , 10 );
02022         if( tmpnb == LONG_MIN || tmpnb == LONG_MAX )
02023         {
02024             n_log( LOG_ERR , "Code received ( %ld ) can not be determined on socket %d\n" , tmpnb , s );
02025             return FALSE ;
02026         }
02027 
02028         (*_code) = tmpnb ;
02029 
02030         /* receving message */
02031         if( (*buf ) )
02032         {
02033             Free( (*buf ) );
02034         }
02035         Malloc( (*buf) , char , (size+1) );
02036         bcount = 0;
02037         br = 0;
02038         ptr = (*buf);
02039         while ( bcount < size )
02040         {                                        /* loop until full buffer */
02041             if ( ( br = recv( s, ptr , size - bcount, NETFLAGS ) ) > 0 )
02042             {
02043                 bcount += br;                    /* increment byte counter */
02044                 ptr += br;                       /* move buffer ptr for next read */
02045             }
02046             else
02047             {
02048                 if( br == 0 && bcount == ( size - bcount ) )
02049                     break ;
02050                 /* signal an error to the caller */
02051                 n_log( LOG_ERR , "Socket %d receive %d Error" , s  , br );
02052                 return FALSE;
02053             }
02054         }
02055         return size ;
02056     } /*recv_php(...)*/
02057 
02058 
02059     /* get queue states */
02060     int netw_get_queue_status( NETWORK *netw , int *nb_to_send , int *nb_to_read )
02061     {
02062         __n_assert( netw , return FALSE );
02063 
02064         pthread_mutex_lock( &netw -> sendbolt );
02065         (*nb_to_send) = netw -> send_buf -> nb_items ;
02066         pthread_mutex_unlock( &netw -> sendbolt );
02067 
02068         pthread_mutex_lock( &netw -> recvbolt );
02069         (*nb_to_read) = netw -> recv_buf -> nb_items ;
02070         pthread_mutex_unlock( &netw -> recvbolt );
02071 
02072         return TRUE ;
02073     }
